markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Limited">
[Friendfetch](/Spells.aspx?ID=860)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 77

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 or 2 willing creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You shoot out ephemeral, telekinetic strands that drag each target directly toward you, stopping in the closest unoccupied space to you in this path. This is [forced movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=451).
name: Friendfetch

text: Friendfetch Two Actions May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands Source Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic pg. 77 Traditions Arcane, Occult Cast somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Target 1 or 2 willing creatures --- You shoot out ephemeral, telekinetic strands that drag each target directly toward you, stopping in the closest unoccupied space to you in this path. This is forced movement.
